meanings.sent1: The cake was nummy and made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: I love to eat nummy cookies with milk.
meanings.sent3: The nummy pizza disappeared in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: The nummy aroma of fresh bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream was so nummy that I couldn't stop eating it.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment or affection
meanings.sent1: My grandma always calls me her little nummy.
meanings.sent2: The puppy looked up at me with big nummy eyes.
meanings.sent3: I whispered 'goodnight, nummy' to my teddy bear.
meanings.sent4: She hugged her friend and said, 'You're my nummy.'
meanings.sent5: The baby's giggle was the sweetest nummy sound.

meanings.definition: To eat or consume eagerly or enthusiastically
meanings.sent1: The kids nummied down their snacks before the movie.
meanings.sent2: I always nummy my favorite meal on Fridays.
meanings.sent3: He nummied the popcorn during the exciting movie scene.
meanings.sent4: She nummied the chocolate cake at the party.
meanings.sent5: The raccoon tried to nummy the berries from the bush.
